info.name: QLCOM Face Recognition API
info.description:
Postman Collection untuk QLCOM HRIS Face Recognition API.

Berisi endpoint:
- POST /register   → daftar wajah karyawan
- POST /recognize  → verifikasi wajah karyawan
- GET  /users      → list karyawan terdaftar
- DELETE /user/{employee_id} → hapus data wajah karyawan

Gunakan variable {{base_url}} untuk mengganti server (lokal / production).

request.description:
Daftar / enroll wajah karyawan baru.

Form-data:
- employee_id (text)
- name (text)
- image (file)

Response success:
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "employee_id": "RAFIKA123",
    "name": "Rafika",
    "num_embeddings": 4
  }
}

formdata.description: File foto wajah (capture dari kamera / file jpg/png)
